Section.name: About Krea University
Section.description:
Krea University is one of the top universities for Liberal Education. Krea University has been enacted by the Legislature of the State of Andhra Pradesh as per The Andhra Pradesh Private Universities (Establishment and Regulation) (Amendment) Act, 2018 vide the gazette notification published on April 30, 2018. The university is a state-private university approved by UGC. As per the NIRF Ranking 2023, the university is ranked 74th in the Management Category. IFMR Society is the sponsoring body of the University. Institute for Financial Management and Research (IFMR) has wide and deep experience in education and research for the past 48 years.
Krea Univerity offers BA, B.Sc. at the UG level, MBA at the PG level and Ph.D. at the doctoral level. Apart from these courses, the university offers certification courses as well. IFMR Graduate School of Business (GSB) at Krea University offers 5-year Integrated BBA + MBA, 2 years MBA, Ph.D., and customised Management Development programs, including Executive Education programs
The university charges a one-time application fee of INR 500. The institute has a strong team of faculty members and great infrastructural facilities. It has witnessed an excellent placement record over the years with satisfactory packages.

Ques. How are the faculties at Krea University?
Ans. The Faculty members at this University are very well-qualified and highly knowledgeable in their respective fields. Almost all the Faculty staffs are Ph.D. holders and Scholars. Each and every faculty member is also a champion in applying an interdisciplinary approach in their teaching style.
Ques. What is the highest salary package offered at Krea University?
Ans. In the last placement session, the highest package offered was INR 22.90 LPA whereas, the average package was INR 13.50 LPA
Ques. Does Krea University provide financial assistance?
Ans. Yes, the university provides financial support to students by offering scholarships like Merit-cum-Means Scholarships, T. Thomas Scholarship for Business Leaders, and Merit Scholarships
Ques. I am a graduate having work experience of 1 year. Am I eligible for MBA at Krea University?
Ans. Yes, any graduate having work experience of less than or equal to 36 months is eligible
Ques. What are the total fees of an MBA at Krea University?
Ans. The total fee for Krea University MBA is INR 14,56,000 which is quite less compared to many colleges.
Ques. Who are the top recruiters at Krea University Placements?
Ans. The top recruiters at Krea University Placements are Axis Bank, HSBS, Wells Fargo, Caredge, Oracle, Infosys, ICICI Bank and many more.
Ques. What are the courses offered at Krea University?
Ans. Krea University offers various courses. The university offers BA, B.Sc. at the UG level, MBA at the PG level and Ph.D. at the doctoral level. Apart from these courses, the university offers certification courses as well.
Ques. Where is Krea University located?
Ans. The exact location of Krea University is 5655, Central Expressway, Sri City, Andhra Pradesh 517646 India.
